full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
## Contract Details
* Contract Title: Inspection, Testing, Certification, Training, and Maintenance Services for Fire and Backflow Systems
* Solicitation Number: 01R11-23-C074
* Publication Date: February 1, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: March 23, 2023 (16:00:00)
* Amendment Date: March 15, 2023

## Service Requirements
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada's Research and Development Centre in Lacombe, Alberta, requires a certified technician(s) to provide the following services:
* Weekly inspections of fire and backflow systems
* Monthly inspections of fire extinguishers
* Quarterly testing of wet sprinkler systems
* Bi-annual inspections of range hood fire suppression systems
* Annual inspections and certification of fire extinguishers, fire suppression systems, and backflow preventers
* Annual testing of wet sprinkler systems and dry sprinkler systems
* Five-year hydrostatic testing of CO2 fire extinguishers
* Six-year maintenance of dry chemical fire extinguishers
* Twelve-year hydrostatic testing of dry chemical fire extinguishers
* Equipment installation and decommission services as required
* Temporary replacement extinguishers for any having to be removed for servicing

## Training Requirements
The contractor is also required to provide one (1) fire extinguisher training session for 10-20 staff members, which will include:
* Anatomy of a fire extinguisher
* Fire extinguisher classification and uses
* Proper use of a fire extinguisher (PASS)
* When to use a fire extinguisher
* Fire tetrahedron

## Tender Process
The tender process is open to all qualified contractors. The bid documents can be downloaded from [link]. The tender closing date is March 23, 2023, at 16:00:00.

## Contact Information
For any questions or concerns, please contact Zack Flamont at 639-560-3462 or zack.flamont@agr.gc.ca. [insert contact information].

## Important Notes
* This tender is not a trade agreement, but is open to contractors who meet the service requirements.
* The contract will be awarded to the contractor who meets the requirements and provides the best proposal.
* The contractor is required to comply with all relevant laws and regulations. VGA-VP)12.)12
